Seek professional support from a therapist, counselor, or doctor if your stress feels unmanageable or lasts for an extended period.
Avoid stimulants such as caffeine or nicotine since they can heighten anxiety and make it harder to relax.
Drink water and have a light snack to stabilize your energy and avoid physical symptoms that worsen stress, like dizziness or fatigue.
Engage in gentle movement like walking, stretching, or yoga to release built-up stress hormones and restore balance to your body.
